DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate effect oral emixustat hydrochloride ( emixustat ) aqueous humor biomarkers associate proliferative diabetic retinopathy ( PDR ) baseline week 12 .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Effects Emixustat Hydrochloride Subjects With Proliferative Diabetic Retinopathy
DOC.detailed_description: This multicenter , randomize , double-masked , placebo-controlled study evaluate effect emixustat subject PDR . Subjects randomly assign either emixustat placebo arm treat daily ( QD ) 12 week . Doses emixustat doubled weekly basis week 4 subject hold stable dose remainder 12-week dosing regimen . Subjects placebo group mock-titrated schedule emixustat arm .
